Author: until_im_enough
Text: Okay so this is gonna sound real awful but sometimes when I can't get out of a social thing that involves food that I am too scared of eating, I order whatever I want to eat (just one thing) then eat about half of it or a quarter (so people see me eat something), then I'll 'accidentally' spill my water or diet soda on it with my arm and then do the whole "oh I'm sorry I didn't mean to". No one would make me eat soggy ruined food so I'm golden for the rest of the evening. But this only works once. And also the guilt I feel is enormous but hey, anything to be a sKinNy leGenD ðŸ™ƒðŸ™ƒðŸ™ƒ
